item.title: Slow-cooked Pork Carnitas
item.description: This recipe makes a lot and is super easy. A whole roast usually makes enough for a few meals (depending on how many people will be eating it). Leftovers can be refrigerated for 4-5 days. ⏲️ Prep time: 15 min 🍳 Cook time: 8 hr 30 min 🍽️ Servings: 10-11 Ingredients 2 ½ lbs. boneless pork shoulder 6 cloves of garlic, cut into slivers 1 ½ teaspoons cumin ½ teaspoon sazon ¼ teaspoon dry oregano ¾ cup low sodium chicken broth 2-3 chipotle peppers in adobo sauce 2 bay leaves ¼ teaspoon dry adobo seasoning Directions Season pork with kosher salt and pepper.
